title: Kevin Spacey Is Cleared of Anthony Rapp’s Battery Claim
description: A jury found Mr. Spacey not liable in a civil trial. Mr. Rapp, an original cast member in “Rent,” had filed a lawsuit accusing Mr. Spacey of making a sexual advance when Mr. Rapp was 14.
dc:creator: Julia Jacobs and Nate Schweber
media:description: After less than an hour and a half of deliberation on Thursday, a jury in the U.S. District Court in Manhattan decided in favor of Kevin Spacey.
